text:
Richard M. Weiner (6 February 1930 – 13 August 2020) was a Romanian-born German professor of theoretical physics. He worked at the University of Marburg in Marburg, Germany. He was an associate of the Laboratoire de Physique Théorique at Paris-Sud 11 University. Weiner was born in Czernowitz, Romania.
Weiner died on 13 August 2020 at the age of 90.
